name: Homini
description:
A game about human relationships: you need to repair them.

In a world where people is losing humanity in loneliness, there is guy who want to revert this trend.
You need to go around in a dark world, looking for people and repair the relationship with them guessing their interests. You need to survive the loss of humanity!

Tip: You can also use the MAP to see where other people is. (But remember that this speed up the loss of humanity!).

Controls
- W-S-A-D to move;
- Mouse click to guess the correct interest.

Made during GGJ2020 in Cagliari (theme: repair)
